00066 
00067 /* atomic compare and exchange 64 bit value */
00068 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG64
00069 L4_INLINE int
00070 l4util_cmpxchg64(volatile l4_uint64_t * dest,
00071      l4_uint64_t cmp_val, l4_uint64_t new_val)
00072 {
00073   l4_uint64_t tmp;
00074 
00075   __asm__ __volatile__
00076     (
00077      LOCK "cmpxchgq %1, %3 \n\t"
00078      :
00079      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0 RAX, return val */
00080      :
00081      "r"  (new_val), /* 1 reg, new value */
00082      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2 RAX, compare value */
00083      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00084      : 
00085      "memory", "cc"
00086      );
00087 
00088   return tmp == cmp_val;
00089 }
00090 
00091 /* atomic compare and exchange 32 bit value */
00092 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG32
00093 L4_INLINE int
00094 l4util_cmpxchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t * dest,
00095      l4_uint32_t cmp_val, l4_uint32_t new_val)
00096 {
00097   l4_uint32_t tmp;
00098 
00099   __asm__ __volatile__
00100     (
00101      LOCK "cmpxchgl %1, %3 \n\t"
00102      :
00103      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0 EAX, return val */
00104      :
00105      "r"  (new_val), /* 1 reg, new value */
00106      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2 EAX, compare value */
00107      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00108      :
00109      "memory", "cc"
00110      );
00111 
00112   return tmp == cmp_val;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /* atomic compare and exchange 16 bit value */
00116 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG16
00117 L4_INLINE int
00118 l4util_cmpxchg16(volatile l4_uint16_t * dest,
00119      l4_uint16_t cmp_val, l4_uint16_t new_val)
00120 {
00121   l4_uint16_t tmp;
00122 
00123   __asm__ __volatile__
00124     (
00125      LOCK "cmpxchgw %1, %3 \n\t"
00126      :
00127      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0  AX, return value */
00128      :
00129      "c"  (new_val), /* 1  CX, new value */
00130      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2  AX, compare value */
00131      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00132      :
00133      "memory", "cc"
00134      );
00135 
00136   return tmp == cmp_val;
00137 }
00138 
00139 /* atomic compare and exchange 8 bit value */
00140 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG8
00141 L4_INLINE int
00142 l4util_cmpxchg8(volatile l4_uint8_t * dest,
00143     l4_uint8_t cmp_val, l4_uint8_t new_val)
00144 {
00145   l4_uint8_t tmp;
00146 
00147   __asm__ __volatile__
00148     (
00149      LOCK "cmpxchgb %1, %3 \n\t"
00150      :
00151      "=a" (tmp)      /* 0  AL, return value */
00152      :
00153      "c"  (new_val), /* 1  CL, new value */
00154      "0"  (cmp_val), /* 2  AL, compare value */
00155      "m"  (*dest)    /* 3 mem, destination operand */
00156      :
00157      "memory", "cc"
00158      );
00159 
00160   return tmp == cmp_val;
00161 }
00162 
00163 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG
00164 L4_INLINE int
00165 l4util_cmpxchg(volatile l4_umword_t * dest,
00166                l4_umword_t cmp_val, l4_umword_t new_val)
00167 {
00168   return l4util_cmpxchg64((volatile l4_uint64_t *)dest,
00169                           (l4_uint64_t)cmp_val, (l4_uint64_t)new_val);
00170 }
00171 
00172 /* atomic exchange 64 bit value */
00173 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG64
00174 L4_INLINE l4_uint64_t
00175 l4util_xchg64(volatile l4_uint64_t * dest, l4_uint64_t val)
00176 {
00177   __asm__ __volatile__
00178     (
00179      LOCK "xchg %0, %1 \n\t"
00180      :
00181      "=r" (val)
00182      :
00183      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00184      :
00185      "memory"
00186     );
00187 
00188   return val;
00189 }
00190 
00191 /* atomic exchange 32 bit value */
00192 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG32
00193 L4_INLINE l4_uint32_t
00194 l4util_xchg32(volatile l4_uint32_t * dest, l4_uint32_t val)
00195 {
00196   __asm__ __volatile__
00197     (
00198      LOCK "xchg %0, %1 \n\t"
00199      :
00200      "=r" (val)
00201      :
00202      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00203      :
00204      "memory"
00205     );
00206 
00207   return val;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /* atomic exchange 16 bit value */
00211 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG16
00212 L4_INLINE l4_uint16_t
00213 l4util_xchg16(volatile l4_uint16_t * dest, l4_uint16_t val)
00214 {
00215   __asm__ __volatile__
00216     (
00217      LOCK "xchg %w0, %1 \n\t"
00218      :
00219      "=r" (val)
00220      :
00221      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00222      :
00223      "memory"
00224     );
00225 
00226   return val;
00227 }
00228 
00229 /* atomic exchange 8 bit value */
00230 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG8
00231 L4_INLINE l4_uint8_t
00232 l4util_xchg8(volatile l4_uint8_t * dest, l4_uint8_t val)
00233 {
00234   __asm__ __volatile__
00235     (
00236      LOCK "xchg %b0, %1 \n\t"
00237      :
00238      "=r" (val)
00239      :
00240      "m" (*dest), "0" (val)
00241      :
00242      "memory"
00243     );
00244 
00245   return val;
00246 }
00247 
00248 /* atomic exchange machine width */
00249 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_XCHG
00250 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00251 l4util_xchg(volatile l4_umword_t * dest, l4_umword_t val)
00252 {
00253   return l4util_xchg64((volatile l4_uint64_t *)dest, (l4_uint64_t)val);
00254 }
00255 
00256 #define l4util_gen_allop(args...) \
00257 l4util_genop( 8,"b", "", args)  \
00258 l4util_genop(16,"w", "", args)  \
00259 l4util_genop(32,"l", "", args)  \
00260 l4util_genop(64,"q", "", args)
00261 
00262 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG8_RES
00263 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG16_RES
00264 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG32_RES
00265 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG64_RES
00266 /* Generate l4_uint{8,16,32,64} l4util_cmpxchg{8,16,32,64}_res(...) */
00267 #undef l4util_genop
00268 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname, opchar)   \
00269 L4_INLINE l4_uint##bit##_t          \
00270 l4util_##opname##bit##_res(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest, \
00271          l4_uint##bit##_t cmp_val,    \
00272          l4_uint##bit##_t new_val)    \
00273 {               \
00274   l4_uint##bit##_t old_val;         \
00275   __asm__ __volatile__            \
00276     (               \
00277      LOCK #opname mod " %"op1"1,%3  \n\t"       \
00278      :                \
00279      "=a"(old_val)            \
00280      :                \
00281      "r"(new_val), "a"(cmp_val), "m" (*dest)      \
00282      :                \
00283      "memory"             \
00284     );                \
00285   return old_val;           \
00286 }
00287 l4util_gen_allop(cmpxchg,cmpxchg)
00288 
00289 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_CMPXCHG_RES
00290 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00291 l4util_cmpxchg_res(volatile l4_umword_t *dest,
00292                    l4_umword_t cmp_val, l4_umword_t new_val)
00293 {
00294   return l4util_cmpxchg64_res((volatile l4_uint64_t *)dest,
00295                               (l4_uint64_t)cmp_val, (l4_uint64_t)new_val);
00296 }

00298 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD8
00299 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD16
00300 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD32
00301 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD64
00302 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB8
00303 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB16
00304 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB32
00305 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB64
00306 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND8
00307 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND16
00308 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND32
00309 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND64
00310 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR8
00311 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR16
00312 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR32
00313 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR64
00314 /* Generate void l4util_{add,sub,and,or}{8,16,32,64}(*dest) */
00315 #undef l4util_genop
00316 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname)     \
00317 L4_INLINE void              \
00318 l4util_##opname##bit(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest, l4_uint##bit##_t val) \
00319 {               \
00320   __asm__ __volatile__            \
00321     (               \
00322      LOCK #opname mod " %1,%0 \n\t"       \
00323      :                \
00324      :                \
00325      "m" (*dest), "ir" (val)          \
00326      :                \
00327      "memory"             \
00328     );                \
00329 }
00330 l4util_gen_allop(add)
00331 l4util_gen_allop(sub)
00332 l4util_gen_allop(and)
00333 l4util_gen_allop(or)
00334 
00335 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD8_RES
00336 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD16_RES
00337 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD32_RES
00338 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD64_RES
00339 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB8_RES
00340 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB16_RES
00341 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB32_RES
00342 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_SUB64_RES
00343 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND8_RES
00344 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND16_RES
00345 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND32_RES
00346 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_AND64_RES
00347 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR8_RES
00348 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR16_RES
00349 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR32_RES
00350 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_OR64_RES
00351 /* Generate l4_uint{8,16,32,64} l4util_{add,sub,and,or}{8,16,32,64}_res(*dest) */
00352 #undef l4util_genop
00353 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname, opchar)   \
00354 L4_INLINE l4_uint##bit##_t          \
00355 l4util_##opname##bit##_res(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest, \
00356          l4_uint##bit##_t val)    \
00357 {               \
00358   l4_uint##bit##_t res, old;          \
00359                 \
00360   do                \
00361     {               \
00362       old = *dest;            \
00363       res = old opchar val;         \
00364     }               \
00365   while (!l4util_cmpxchg##bit(dest, old, res));     \
00366                 \
00367   return res;             \
00368 }
00369 l4util_gen_allop(add, +)
00370 l4util_gen_allop(sub, -)
00371 l4util_gen_allop(and, &)
00372 l4util_gen_allop(or, &&)
00373 
00374 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC8
00375 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC16
00376 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC32
00377 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC64
00378 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC8
00379 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC16
00380 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC32
00381 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC64
00382 /* Generate void l4util_{inc,dec}{8,16,32,64}(*dest) */
00383 #undef l4util_genop
00384 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname)     \
00385 L4_INLINE void              \
00386 l4util_##opname##bit(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest)   \
00387 {               \
00388   __asm__ __volatile__            \
00389     (               \
00390      LOCK #opname mod " %0  \n\t"         \
00391      :                \
00392      :                \
00393      "m" (*dest)            \
00394      :                \
00395      "memory"             \
00396     );                \
00397 }
00398 l4util_gen_allop(inc)
00399 l4util_gen_allop(dec)
00400 
00401 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC8_RES
00402 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC16_RES
00403 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC32_RES
00404 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC64_RES
00405 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC8_RES
00406 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC16_RES
00407 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC32_RES
00408 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_DEC64_RES
00409 /* Generate l4_uint{8,16,32,64} l4util_{inc,dec}{8,16,32,64}_res(*dest) */
00410 #undef l4util_genop
00411 #define l4util_genop(bit, mod, op1, opname, opchar)   \
00412 L4_INLINE l4_uint##bit##_t          \
00413 l4util_##opname##bit##_res(volatile l4_uint##bit##_t* dest) \
00414 {               \
00415   l4_uint##bit##_t res, old;          \
00416                 \
00417   do                \
00418     {               \
00419       res = *dest;            \
00420       old = res opchar;           \
00421     }               \
00422   while (!l4util_cmpxchg##bit(dest, old, res));     \
00423                 \
00424   return res;             \
00425 }
00426 l4util_gen_allop(inc, ++)
00427 l4util_gen_allop(dec, --)
00428 
00429 #undef l4util_genop
00430 #undef l4util_gen_allop
00431 
00432 
00433 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_ADD
00434 L4_INLINE void
00435 l4util_atomic_add(volatile long *dest, long val)
00436 {
00437   __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK "addq %1, %0  \n"
00438                        : "=m" (*dest)
00439                        : "ri" (val), "m" (*dest));
00440 }
00441 
00442 #define __L4UTIL_ATOMIC_HAVE_ARCH_INC
00443 L4_INLINE void
00444 l4util_atomic_inc(volatile long *dest)
00445 {
00446   __asm__ __volatile__(LOCK "incq %0"
00447                        : "=m" (*dest)
00448                        : "m" (*dest));
00449 }
00450 
00451 #endif /* ! __L4UTIL__INCLUDE__ARCH_AMD64__ATOMIC_ARCH_H__ */
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
